title: Note :- When a building abuts three or more roads, the above mentioned uses, except (iv), shall be permissible in front setback facing a smaller road of less importance from traffic point of view
clause_text: Note :- When a building abuts three or more roads, the above mentioned uses, except (iv), shall be permissible in front setback facing a smaller road of less importance from traffic point of view.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
